If anyone have this problem like I did here is the solution.

1. Listen for the nVidia logo to start and press Esc.
2. Another video will play, press Esc again.
3. Wait a second and press Esc once more.
4. You are now at the Main Menu. Press Down arrow 3 times and press Enter. (you should hear click sounds as you navigate the menus)
5. You are in Options Menu. Press Down arrow 2 times  and Enter.
6. You are in Video Options. Press Down arrow 1 time, then hold down the Left arrow until the click sounds stop.
7. You are going to change the Resolution to 640x480. Press Esc, wait for a second and press Enter, wait 5 more seconds and press Enter again.
8. If you did everything right then you should now see the Video Options menu on screen. Use the arrow keys or mouse to set the resolution up to 1024x768 (or whatever you want), press Esc, press Enter to accept, wait for screen change and press Enter to accept again.
9. Now fully exit the game, restart the game and hope that it saved your changes.

Good Luck.
